_comment_PEER_ADDRESS: For peer behind NAT or with dynamic IP, see PEER_LEARN setting
_comment_PEER_LEARN: Set to "learn" if the peer address is dynamic or client is behind >>> NAT <<<
in which case the peer address is learned from first incoming packets
Set to "dynamic" to allow relearning the peer address from each incoming packet
Set to "off" to disable learning/relearning of peer address
If set to "learn" or "dynamic", the PEER_ADDRESS and PEER_PORT settings are ignored.
_comment_MTU: Recommended to set 220 bytes lower than the MTU of the underlying network (e.g., for standard Ethernet 1500 use 1300)
_comment_ENCRYPTION_KEY: Use easydupvpn-genkey to generate a secure random key
_comment_DEDUPLICATION_TTL_SECONDS: Time in seconds to remember seen nonces for deduplication purposes
_comment_NUMBER_OF_DUPLICATES: Number of duplicate packets to send for each original packet
_comment_PROTOCOL_HEADER: Adds 'RUV' magic bytes to packets. Set to false to make VPN traffic harder to identify (both peers must use the same setting)
